name: Burger King
address: Burger King, 660-7488 King George Blvd, Surrey, BC V3W 0H9, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Not just for vegetarians, the great tasting BK VEGGIE® sandwich is a flame-grilled soya burger topped with fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, slices of white onions and ketchup, all on a toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Crispy Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Introducing the Spicy Crispy Chicken Sandwich made with juicy, tender and crispy premium white meat chicken, seasoned and breaded with bold flavours and just the right amount of heat; topped with fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and creamy mayonnaise all on a potato bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Whopper with Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: The WHOPPER with Cheese Sandwich is a ¼ lb of savory flame-grilled beef topped with melted cheese, ripe tomatoes, fresh lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced onions, all on a warm, toasted, sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: French Fries
hasMenuItem.description: More delicious than ever, piping hot, thick cut French Fries are golden on the outside and fluffy on the inside.

hasMenuItem.name: Whopper
hasMenuItem.description:
The WHOPPER® is a ¼ lb* of savoury flame-grilled beef topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a toasted sesame seed bun.

*Based on pre-cooked patty weight.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Nuggets
hasMenuItem.description: Made with 100% Canadian white meat chicken, our bite-sized Chicken Nuggets are tender and juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside. Coated in a homestyle seasoned breading, they are perfect for dipping in any of our delicious dipping sauces.

hasMenuItem.name: Original Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: The Original Chicken Sandwich is a lightly breaded chicken fillet topped with a combination of shredded lettuce and creamy mayonnaise on a sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Made with premium white meat chicken, Chicken Fries are coated in a light crispy breading seasoned with savoury spices and herbs.

hasMenuItem.name: Poutine
hasMenuItem.description: Try the delicious poutine at BURGER KING® and enjoy the classic taste of fresh golden fries smothered with cheese curds & piping hot gravy. The flavours melt together to create a truly Canadian favourite.

hasMenuItem.name: Double Whopper
hasMenuItem.description:
The Double WHOPPER® is a pairing of two ¼ lb* savoury flame-grilled beef patties topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a toasted sesame seed bun.

*Based on pre-cooked patty weight.

hasMenuItem.name: Whopper Jr.
hasMenuItem.description: It’s a little WHOPPER® with the same big taste. Featuring a savoury flame-grilled beef patty topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Mozzarella Sticks Snack Box
hasMenuItem.description: Four Mozzarella Sticks paired with French Fries, Onion Rings, and your choice of 1 Dipping Sauce, all boxed together to make the perfect snack!

hasMenuItem.name: Original Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: The Original Chicken Sandwich is a lightly breaded chicken fillet topped with a combination of shredded lettuce and creamy mayonnaise on a sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: 8pc Chicken Nuggets
hasMenuItem.description: Made with 100% Canadian white meat chicken, our bite-sized Chicken Nuggets are tender and juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside. Coated in a homestyle seasoned breading, they are perfect for dipping in any of our delicious dipping sauces.

hasMenuItem.name: Wednesday's Whopper
hasMenuItem.description: Burger King’s NEW Wednesday’s Whopper is inspired by The Addams Family & features a 1/4 lb* flame-grilled beef patty, melty swiss cheese, juicy tomatoes, crisp lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a toasted purple sesame seed bun coloured with purple potato. *Weight based on pre-cooked patty.

hasMenuItem.name: Wednesday's Double Whopper
hasMenuItem.description: Burger King’s NEW Wednesday’s Double Whopper is inspired by The Addams Family & features two 1/4 lb* flame-grilled beef patty, melty swiss cheese, juicy tomatoes, crisp lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a toasted purple sesame seed bun coloured with purple potato. *Weight based on pre-cooked patty.

hasMenuItem.name: Gomez's Churro Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Burger King’s NEW Gomez’s Churro Fries are inspired by The Addams Family & made from fried crispy pastry dough tossed in cinnamon sugar, served warm with chocolate sauce for a dippable dessert on-the-go.

hasMenuItem.name: Carolina BBQ Original Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: BBQ season is here! The Carolina BBQ Original Chicken Sandwich features a lightly breaded chicken fillet topped with a delicious combination of Cheese, Bacon, Hickory Seasoned Potato Sticks, Lettuce, and a Carolina BBQ Sauce, all on a warm, toasted, sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Morticia's Kooky Chocolate Shake
hasMenuItem.description: Burger King’s NEW Morticia’s Kooky Chocolate Shake is inspired by The Addams Family, made with creamy soft serve mixed with chocolate cake batter fudge, brownie bits, and topped with black & purple cookie pieces.

hasMenuItem.name: Blood Orange Lemonade
hasMenuItem.description: All the flavour of Lemonade mixed perfectly with a Blood Orange twist.

hasMenuItem.name: Carolina BBQ Poutine
hasMenuItem.description: BBQ season is here! Enjoy a Carolina twist on a Canadian classic with the Carolina BBQ Poutine. Our signature French Fries topped with Cheese Curds, Gravy, Carolina BBQ Sauce, and Hickory Seasoned Potato Sticks.

hasMenuItem.name: NEW! Mozzarella Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Burger King’s Mozzarella Fries come with a Marinara dipping sauce and make the perfect snack or addition to a combo meal!

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Made with premium white meat chicken, Chicken Fries are coated in a light crispy breading seasoned with savoury spices and herbs.

hasMenuItem.name: Whopper with Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: The WHOPPER with Cheese Sandwich is a ¼ lb of savory flame-grilled beef topped with melted cheese, ripe tomatoes, fresh lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced onions, all on a warm, toasted, sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Whopper
hasMenuItem.description:
The WHOPPER® is a ¼ lb* of savoury flame-grilled beef topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a toasted sesame seed bun.

*Based on pre-cooked patty weight.

hasMenuItem.name: Double Whopper
hasMenuItem.description:
The Double WHOPPER® is a pairing of two ¼ lb* savoury flame-grilled beef patties topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a toasted sesame seed bun.

*Based on pre-cooked patty weight.

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon King
hasMenuItem.description:
Our BACON KING features two ¼ lb savoury flame-grilled beef patties, topped a with hearty portion of thick-cut smoked bacon, melted cheese and topped with ketchup and creamy mayonnaise all on a soft sesame seed bun.
*Based on pre-cooked patty weight.

hasMenuItem.name: Roadhouse King
hasMenuItem.description:
The Roadhouse King™ features two ¼ lb savoury flame-grilled beef patties, topped with 4 half-strips of thick-cut smoked bacon, crispy onion rings, tangy BBQ sauce, cheese and creamy mayonnaise all on our sesame seed bun.
*Based on pre-cooked patty weight.

hasMenuItem.name: Whopper Jr.
hasMenuItem.description: It’s a little WHOPPER® with the same big taste. Featuring a savoury flame-grilled beef patty topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Impossible™ Whopper
hasMenuItem.description: The Impossible Whopper is 100% Whopper and 0% Beef. Try our new plant-based Whopper topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Triple Whopper
hasMenuItem.description:
The Triple WHOPPER® is stacked with three ¼ lb* savoury flame-grilled beef patties topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a toasted sesame seed bun.

*Based on pre-cooked patty weight.

hasMenuItem.name: Double Cheeseburger
hasMenuItem.description: Make room for a Double Cheeseburger, two signature flame-grilled beef patties topped with a layer of melted cheese, crinkle cut pickles, yellow mustard, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Double Quarter Pound King
hasMenuItem.description:
The Double Quarter Pound King™ features two 1/4 lb savoury flame-grilled beef patties, topped with all of the classic favourites: melted cheese, freshly sliced onions, zesty pickles, ketchup, & mustard all on a toasted sesame seed bun. 
*Based on pre-cooked patty weight.

hasMenuItem.name: BBQ Bacon King
hasMenuItem.description:
The BBQ Bacon King™ features two ¼ lb savoury flame-grilled beef patties, topped a with hearty portion of thick-cut smoked bacon, melted cheese topped with BBQ sauce and creamy mayonnaise all on a soft sesame seed bun.
*Based on pre-cooked patty weight.

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon Cheeseburger
hasMenuItem.description: You can’t go wrong with a Bacon Cheeseburger! A signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with crispy bacon and a layer of melted cheese, crunchy pickles, yellow mustard and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon Double Cheeseburger
hasMenuItem.description: Two beef patties plus bacon! The Bacon Double Cheeseburger features two signature flame-grilled beef patties, topped with crispy bacon, melted cheese, topped with ketchup, mustard and crunchy pickles all on a toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Whopper with Bacon
hasMenuItem.description:
The WHOPPER with Bacon sandwich is a ¼ lb* savoury flame-grilled beef patty topped with crispy bacon, juicy tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a toasted sesame seed bun.

*Based on pre-cooked patty weight.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheeseburger
hasMenuItem.description: You can’t go wrong with a Cheeseburger, a signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with a layer of melted cheese, crunchy pickles, yellow mustard, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Single Quarter Pound King
hasMenuItem.description:
The Quarter Pound King™ features a 1/4 lb savoury flame-grilled beef patty, topped with all of the classic favourites: melted cheese, freshly sliced onions, zesty pickles, ketchup, & mustard all on a toasted sesame seed bun.
*Based on pre-cooked patty weight.

hasMenuItem.name: Roadhouse Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Our Roadhouse Burger features a signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with sweet and smoky BBQ sauce and crispy onion rings served on a toasted, sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Wednesday's Double Whopper
hasMenuItem.description: Burger King’s NEW Wednesday’s Double Whopper is inspired by The Addams Family & features two 1/4 lb* flame-grilled beef patty, melty swiss cheese, juicy tomatoes, crisp lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a toasted purple sesame seed bun coloured with purple potato. *Weight based on pre-cooked patty.

hasMenuItem.name: Hamburger
hasMenuItem.description: Try a Hamburger, a signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with a layer of crunchy pickles, yellow mustard, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Crispy Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Introducing the Spicy Crispy Chicken Sandwich made with juicy, tender and crispy premium white meat chicken, seasoned and breaded with bold flavours and just the right amount of heat; topped with fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and creamy mayonnaise all on a potato bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: The Crispy Chicken Sandwich is a premium white meat chicken fillet, seasoned and breaded and carefully layered with fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and creamy mayonnaise on a potato bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Original Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: The Original Chicken Sandwich is a lightly breaded chicken fillet topped with a combination of shredded lettuce and creamy mayonnaise on a sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Big Fish
hasMenuItem.description: The BK BIG FISH® is a light and flaky Alaskan Pollock fillet topped with creamy tartar sauce and shredded lettuce on a potato bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Original Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: A lightly breaded chicken fillet topped with a delicious combination of shredded lettuce and angry sauce, served on a toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Jr.
hasMenuItem.description: The Chicken Jr. is loaded with chopped lettuce, a light layer of creamy mayonnaise, and served to you freshly prepared on a perfectly toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Roadhouse Crispy Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: The Roadhouse Crispy Chicken Sandwich is made with a premium white meat chicken fillet, topped with 4 half-strips of thick-cut smoked bacon, crispy onion rings, tangy BBQ sauce, creamy mayonnaise and cheese all on a potato bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Made with premium white meat chicken, Chicken Fries are coated in a light crispy breading seasoned with savoury spices and herbs. Chicken Fries are shaped like fries and are perfect to dip in any delicious dipping sauce. 9 pieces included.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Big Fish
hasMenuItem.description: The Spicy BK BIG FISH® Sandwich is a light and flaky Alaskan Pollock fillet topped with angry sauce and shredded lettuce on a potato bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Chicken Jr.
hasMenuItem.description: The Spicy Chicken Jr. Sandwich is loaded with chopped lettuce, angry sauce, and served to you freshly prepared on a perfectly toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Carolina BBQ Original Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: BBQ season is here! The Carolina BBQ Original Chicken Sandwich features a lightly breaded chicken fillet topped with a delicious combination of Cheese, Bacon, Hickory Seasoned Potato Sticks, Lettuce, and a Carolina BBQ Sauce, all on a warm, toasted, sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Chicken Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: The new Spicy Chicken Wrap makes for the perfect snack! Made with a seasoned and breaded chicken fillet, a juicy tomato, fresh cut lettuce, and our signature Angry Sauce for a spicy kick, all wrapped in a soft tortilla.

hasMenuItem.name: Ranch Chicken Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: The new Ranch Chicken Wrap makes for the perfect snack! Made with a seasoned and breaded chicken fillet, a juicy tomato, fresh cut lettuce, and creamy ranch sauce all wrapped in a soft tortilla.

hasMenuItem.name: 5pc French Toast Sticks
hasMenuItem.description: Sweet, golden brown and piping hot, French Toast Sticks are perfect for dipping in a side of sweet syrup.

hasMenuItem.description: Sweet, golden brown and piping hot, French Toast Sticks are perfect for dipping in a side of sweet syrup.

hasMenuItem.name: Onion Rings
hasMenuItem.description: Served hot and crispy, golden Onion Rings are the perfect side to any meal.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Fries Snack Box
hasMenuItem.description: Four Chicken Fries paired with French Fries, Onion Rings, and your choice of 1 Dipping Sauce, all boxed together to make the perfect snack!

hasMenuItem.name: Have-sies
hasMenuItem.description: When you cannot decide between adding Fries or Onion Rings to your order, now you can get both with Have-sies! Try Have-sies to get a side of half golden fries and half crunchy onion rings.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Chicken Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: The new Spicy Chicken Wrap makes for the perfect snack! Made with a seasoned and breaded chicken fillet, a juicy tomato, fresh cut lettuce, and our signature Angry Sauce for a spicy kick, all wrapped in a soft tortilla.

hasMenuItem.name: Carolina BBQ Poutine
hasMenuItem.description: BBQ season is here! Enjoy a Carolina twist on a Canadian classic with the Carolina BBQ Poutine. Our signature French Fries topped with Cheese Curds, Gravy, Carolina BBQ Sauce, and Hickory Seasoned Potato Sticks.

hasMenuItem.name: Ranch Chicken Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: The new Ranch Chicken Wrap makes for the perfect snack! Made with a seasoned and breaded chicken fillet, a juicy tomato, fresh cut lettuce, and creamy ranch sauce all wrapped in a soft tortilla.

hasMenuItem.name: Gomez's Churro Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Burger King’s NEW Gomez’s Churro Fries are inspired by The Addams Family & made from fried crispy pastry dough tossed in cinnamon sugar, served warm with chocolate sauce for a dippable dessert on-the-go.

hasMenuItem.name: NEW! Mozzarella Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Burger King’s Mozzarella Fries come with a Marinara dipping sauce and make the perfect snack or addition to a combo meal!

hasMenuItem.name: 4pc Nuggets King Jr. Meal
hasMenuItem.description: The Chicken Nuggets King Jr.™ Meal features four bite-sized nuggets made with tender, seasoned white meat and lightly coated in a seasoned home-style breading. Perfect for dipping into any kid-friendly sauce. Served with a choice of a Kid's French Fries, Kid's Onion Rings, or MOTT'S FRUITSATIONS® apple sauce and a small drink of your choice. Toy included.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheeseburger King Jr. Meal
hasMenuItem.description: The Cheeseburger King Jr. Meal is a signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with a simple layer of melted cheese, crunchy pickles, yellow mustard, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun. Served with a choice of a Kid's French Fries, Kid's Onion Rings, or MOTT'S FRUITSATIONS® apple sauce and a small drink of your choice. Toy included.

hasMenuItem.name: 6pc Nuggets King Jr. Meal
hasMenuItem.description: The Chicken Nuggets King Jr. Meal features six bite-sized nuggets made with tender, seasoned white meat and lightly coated in a seasoned home-style breading. Perfect for dipping into any kid-friendly sauce. Served with a choice of a Kid's French Fries, Kid's Onion Rings, or MOTT'S FRUITSATIONS® apple sauce and a small drink of your choice. Toy included.

hasMenuItem.name: Hamburger King Jr. Meal
hasMenuItem.description: The Hamburger King Jr.™ Meal is a signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with a simple layer of crunchy pickles, yellow mustard, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun. Served with a choice of Kid's French Fries, Kid's Onion Rings, or MOTT'S FRUITSATIONS® apple sauce and a small drink of your choice. Toy included.

hasMenuItem.name: Coffee
hasMenuItem.description: Smooth Roast Coffee is made from 100% Arabica beans that delivers a balanced mild flavour and pairs perfectly with breakfast, lunch or dinner.

hasMenuItem.name: Hot Chocolate
hasMenuItem.description: Delicious and creamy, hot chocolate is simply a classic treat.

hasMenuItem.name: DASANI Water
hasMenuItem.description: DASANI, the exclusive bottled water of BURGER KING Restaurants of Canada, is a cool and refreshing way to wash down your signature favourites.

hasMenuItem.name: Oasis Orange Juice
hasMenuItem.description: Oasis® Orange Juice explodes with flavour, contains no added sugars or sweeteners and is a good source of Vitamin C.

hasMenuItem.name: Oasis Apple Juice
hasMenuItem.description: 100% real apple juice from concentrate with no added ingredients. All natural beverage containing no preservatives.

review.reviewBody: chicken for 3 bundle is an amazing bang for your buck. highly impressed. and was delicious 😋
I did not receive my original chicken sandwhich. this is the second time my order was messed up from here and will be my last time ordering
Honestly the best poutine I have had hamber delicious
Great Service and Food, as always!!💯 Thanks BK Team.
The Value bundle for 4 is a great god damn price.
